outputs.output_descr: G-LED is an integrated governance-recovery programme that focuses on increasing the capacity of local governance institutions, civil society, the private sector and communities so they can jointly plan, implement, monitor and sustain socio-economic development. Women and youth feature as key target groups within the project.

Objective of this project is to improve sustainable livelihood opportunities in target communities and support the capacity enhancement of local level governance institutions / public sector organizations to coordinate and manage service delivery.
outputs.output_title: Northern LDP II & Agro Econ Dv

outputs.output_descr: The specific Objectives are to make a subtantial contribution to the transition from post conflict relief and reconstruction to sustainable development by supporting selected districts in North and East. Three inter connected Objectives are to Support poverty reduction and the provision of basic infrastructure and services for vulnerable population; To support local economic development and to strengthen Local governance.

project_descr: Programme for strengthening governance capacities at District, Divisional and Provincial levels and improving socio-economic opportunities in vulnerable regions in the country.
project_title: Governance for Local Economic Development (GLED) - DIM
